name: Roombotic Makeover
description:
You are an everyday roomba™, you spend your days vacuuming your master's house.

One day, robbers break into your home and steal you to use for themselves. Upon arriving at their home, you find they have no furniture! You take it upon yourself to reorganize their rooms to match your old home, using whatever you can find.

It doesn't matter if it matches what you were used to, it just has to be close enough!

Controls
  • WASD - movement
  • C - toggle between makeover and the reference room
  • G - grab things (probably broken ;))
